scripts.build: yarn --cwd admin license:generate && aspida && run-s build:server build:admin
scripts.build:admin:electron: yarn --cwd admin/electron setup && yarn --cwd admin/electron build && yarn --cwd admin/electron dist
scripts.license:check: yarn --cwd admin license:check && yarn --cwd server license:check && yarn --cwd admin/electron license:check
scripts.license:generate: yarn --cwd admin license:generate && yarn --cwd server license:generate && yarn --cwd admin/electron license:generate
scripts.prepare:cover: yarn setup:install && yarn setup:config && yarn --cwd server build:frourio && aspida && yarn --cwd admin license:generate
scripts.prepare:pages: yarn setup:install && yarn setup:config && yarn --cwd server build:frourio && aspida && yarn --cwd admin license:generate
scripts.prepare:typecheck: yarn setup:install && yarn setup:config && yarn --cwd admin license:generate
scripts.setup: yarn install --network-timeout 1000000 && yarn setup:server && yarn setup:admin && yarn build
scripts.setup:install: yarn install --network-timeout 1000000 && (cd admin && yarn install --network-timeout 1000000) && (cd server && yarn install --network-timeout 1000000)
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn typecheck && yarn cover
scripts.typecheck: yarn build:types && tsc --noEmit -p admin && tsc --noEmit -p server
scripts.update:common: npx npm-check-updates -u --timeout 100000 && yarn install && yarn upgrade && yarn audit
